description:
KDE Plasma 6.0.5 is now available as the fifth and final maintenance update to the KDE Plasma 6 desktop environment series fixing more bugs.

The post KDE Plasma 6.0.5 Released as the Last Update in the Series with More Bug Fixes appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: KDE Plasma 6.0.5 Released as the Last Update in the Series with More Bug Fixes

description:
NVIDIA 555 beta graphics driver for Linux is now available for public testing with explicit sync support on Wayland and other improvements. Here's what to expect from the final release.

The post NVIDIA 555 Beta Linux Graphics Driver Released with Explicit Sync Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: NVIDIA 555 Beta Linux Graphics Driver Released with Explicit Sync Support
